title: 5 Oscar-Nominated Songs: Take A Listen
teaser: The songs nominated for the Academy Award for Best Original Song come from a number of genres: pop, country and hip-hop.
contentencoded:
The five songs nominated for the Academy Award for Best Original Song come from a number of genres: pop, country and hip-hop. Glenn Whipp, who covers the awards season for the Los Angeles Times, joins Here & Now’s Jeremy Hobson to take a listen to the contenders.
